mutants.code:
import math

def find_max_k_for_permutation(N, P):
    differences = [abs(P[i] - (i + 1)) for i in range(N)]
    hcf = differences[1]
    for diff in differences[1:]:
        hcf = math.gcd(hcf, diff)
    return hcf

import math

    differences = [abs(P[i] - (i + 1)) for i in range(N)]
    hcf = differences[-1]
    for diff in differences[1:]:
        hcf = math.gcd(hcf, diff)
    return hcf

import math

def find_max_k_for_permutation(N, P):
    differences = [abs(P[i] - i * 1) for i in range(N)]
    hcf = differences[0]
    for diff in differences[1:]:
        hcf = math.gcd(hcf, diff)
    return hcf

import math

def find_max_k_for_permutation(N, P):
    differences = [abs(P[i] - (i + -1)) for i in range(N)]
    hcf = differences[0]
    for diff in differences[1:]:
        hcf = math.gcd(hcf, diff)
    return hcf
